name: unsorted
content:
unsorted adjective
(THINGS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Things that are unsorted have not been separated into groups or put into the right order: The materials are delivered unsorted to recycling facilities. They handed over some unsorted documents.
More examplesFewer examplesFood was rotting because it arrived unsorted.The plastics arrived unsorted and contaminated.The boxes were stuffed with unsorted records and CDs.They clambered over mountains of unsorted clothes.

unsorted adjective
(PROBLEM)
UK informal If a problem is unsorted, it has not been dealt with in a satisfactory way: She would never discuss disagreements or criticism, so any problems were left unsorted - there couldn't ever be any closure.
